task.description: Add status filter to Kanban Board

gaps.topic: Filter UI patterns for kanban boards
Task status relationship to Project states
Filter feature priority vs other Kanban features

task.description: Decision resolution: D1 - Algorithmic hex placement OK for Release 1?

resolution.chosen_option: Manual — builder places from day one
resolution.rationale: Algorithmic placement looks and feels bad. Manual placement doesn't add much overhead. Standard - Spatial Interaction Rules upheld from R1.

eliminated_work: #612 Patch: Standard - Spatial Interaction Rules override

task.description: Decision resolution: D2 - Jarvis UI — route or overlay?

resolution.chosen_option: Overlay — panel/drawer accessible from the map
resolution.rationale: Overlay for now. Route-based council chamber deferred.

task.description: Decision resolution: D3 - One project per hex?

resolution.chosen_option: One project per hex. Sanctuary is a 3-tile exception.
resolution.rationale: One per hex, simpler data model. Sanctuary gets special treatment as a multi-tile structure.

task.description: Decision resolution: D4 - What happens to category room agents?

resolution.rationale: Remove. Category agents are vestigial. Jarvis and Marvin handle everything.

title: Patch: Structure - Hex Grid (infinite → bounded initial canvas)
resolution: R1 ships bounded initial canvas. Design intent: cozy-not-vacuous. Fog-of-war preferred, fixed small grid acceptable fallback. Technical approach owned by Jess + AI.

title: Patch: Standard - Onboarding Sequence (Mesa → Jarvis)
resolution: All Mesa references replaced with Jarvis per D4 resolution. Category room agents removed for R1.

title: Patch: System - Onboarding (Day 1/2/3 → single campfire)
resolution: R1 collapses Day 1/2/3 onboarding sequence to single campfire conversation + walk.

task.description: D5 shaping: Campfire conversation design — posture-based hybrid approach

resolution.chosen_option: Designed posture sequence + free-form content (shaping, not final)
resolution.rationale: Grounded in MI (Engaging → Focusing → Evoking → Planning), Bordin Working Alliance (exit criteria: goals, tasks, bond), Co-Active Designed Alliance (co-created agreement), Stages of Change (pacing calibrated to starting state). Maps to Me/You/Us relational knowledge exchange.

task.description: Library PATCH: Add extraction layer vision to knowledge architecture cards

changes.scope: Added extraction pipeline mechanism (rubric-driven extraction, touchpoint-specific targets, relational touchpoint triggers, cross-agent availability contract). Bridges the gap between capture philosophy and stored knowledge. Vision layer — R1 implementation handled separately in D6.

changes.new_framing: What structured output does the campfire conversation produce that all agents can use?
changes.recommended: Option B for R1 — reflection IS the scorecard

task.description: Decision resolution: D6 - Campfire scorecard extraction mechanism

resolution.rationale: Jarvis reflects back understanding in Planning phase; builder confirms/corrects. The reflection IS the scorecard. Matches Agreement Over Expectation. Natural part of MI-grounded posture sequence.
